overview:
Director, Social Media and Marketing

ShareMy360.com is a new way for people to create and share their experiences online.

Free, easy to create and share, ShareMy360.com virtual tours are uniquely interactive.

Embed rich content directly into panoramic images with the use of hotspots. Include video, documents, slides hows, audio tracks, web links - almost anything you can find online can be included within a ShareMy360.com interactive virtual tour experience.

Tours can include three different segments: panoramas from the inside looking out (common in real estate), panoramas from the outside looking in (great to showcase sculpture, for example), and linear segments (a series of images along a path).

ShareMy360.com interactive tours can be embedded seamlessly on to any website or shared via any social media.

Visit: www.sharemy360.com/index.php?ketechcrunchbio
